casebody.data:
SCHOONMAKER CONNORS CO., Inc., Libelant-Appellee, v. Benno LEVISON and Lois C. Levison, Respondents-Appellants. (Circuit Court of Appeals. Second Circuit. December 6, 1926.) No. 101. McManus, Ernst & Ernst, of New York City (Curley C. Hoffpauir, of New York City, of counsel), for appellants. William F. Purdy, of New York City, for appellee.

Before HOUGH, HAND, and MACK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed, with interest and costs.
